Menpora dan Iwan Bule Bertemu, Piala Dunia U-20 2021 Jadi Pokok Bahasan
04 Nov 2019, 19:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora), Zainudin Amali melakukan pertemuan dengan Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan. Rapat dilakukan di Kantor Kemenpora, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Menurut penuturan Menpora, banyak hal yang dibahas dalam pertemuan tersebut. Satu di antaranya adalah persiapan untuk mensukseskan Indonesia sebagai host Piala Dunia U-20 2021.
"Alhamdulillah meski baru pertemuan pertama pemerintah dan PSSI pahami apa yang menjadi tugasnya masing-masing. PSSI sebagai cabang olahraga yang berinduk ke FIFA mereka tahu apa yang dilakukan. Kami akan komunikasi terus apalagi untuk jadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 2021 karena waktunya sangat singkat," ujar Menpora usai.
"Kami berpesan kepada Ketum PSSI untuk berkomunikasi intens. Jangan lagi saling menunggu dengan hambatan-hambatan birokrasi kami sepakat untuk lakukan itu. Perintah dari Instruksi presiden, selesaikan pembuatan roadmap sepak bola karena itu jadi hal harus diselesaikan segera pekerjaan rutin PSSI sebagai federasi sepak bola. Silakan jalankan program-program tapi waktu dekat persoalan juga harus segera diselesaikan," katanya menambahkan.

Menpora and Iwan Bule Meet, 2021 U-20 World Cup is the Subject
Nov 04 2019, 19:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora), Zainudin Amali held a meeting with PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan. The meeting was held at the Kemenpora Office, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
According to Menpora, many things were discussed at the meeting. One of them is preparation for the success of Indonesia as the host of the 2021 U-20 World Cup.
"Alhamdulillah, even though it was only the first meeting between the government and PSSI to understand what was their respective duties. PSSI as a sport branch to FIFA they knew what was being done. We will continue communication especially to host the 2021 U-20 World Cup because the time is very short, "said the Menpora after.
"We advised the PSSI Ketum to communicate intensely. No longer waiting for each other with bureaucratic obstacles we agreed to do that. Orders from the Presidential Instruction, complete the making of a soccer roadmap because it was so that things had to be completed immediately PSSI's routine work as a football federation. Please run the programs but in the near future the problem must also be resolved immediately, "he added.
